  • Method Details

    • getVotesCafes

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Boolean>> getVotesCafes()
      Gets the list of votes for cafes. This method calculates the middle voice for cafes. See calculateMidleVoiceCafe.calculateMidleVoice(VotingSystem, int) for details.
      Returns:
      The list of votes for cafes.

    • getVotesHodCafes

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> getVotesHodCafes()
      Gets the list of vote counts for cafes. This method calculates the middle voice for cafes. See calculateMidleVoiceCafe for details.
      Returns:
      The list of vote counts for cafes.

    • getVotes

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Boolean>> getVotes()
      Gets the list of votes for restaurants. This method calculates the middle voice for restaurants. See calculateMidleVoiceRest for details.
      Returns:
      The list of votes for restaurants.

    • getVotesHod

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> getVotesHod()
      Gets the list of vote counts for restaurants. This method calculates the middle voice for restaurants. See calculateMidleVoiceRest for details.
      Returns:
      The list of vote counts for restaurants.

    • creatingObjects

      public void creatingObjects()
      Initializes the objects of the voting system. Sets up the necessary data structures and creates users, hosts, restaurants, and cafes. for (int i = 0; i < kolkoUser; i++) Creating users, restaurants, and cafes Finally, I have a function to sort cafes and restaurants by their name sortRestaurantsAndCafesByName()

    • sortRestaurantsAndCafesByName

      public void sortRestaurantsAndCafesByName()
      Sorts the restaurants and cafes by name. use of lambda expressions

    • registrationCrtUsr

      public boolean registrationCrtUsr(String username, String password, boolean expert)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new user.
      password - The password of the new user.
      expert - Indicates if the new user is an expert or not.
      Returns:
      True if registration is successful, false otherwise.

    • loginCheckHost

      public boolean loginCheckHost(String username, String password)
      Checks the host's login credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - The username entered by the host.
      password - The password entered by the host.
      Returns:
      True if the login is successful, false otherwise.

      password - The password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      True if the login is successful, false otherwise.

    • isCafe

      public boolean isCafe(String name)
      Checks if a given name corresponds to a cafe in the system.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the name corresponds to a cafe, false otherwise.

    • hodnoteRest

      public float hodnoteRest(int hodnota, int akyVoterDalHolos, int akyrestoran, boolean isCafe)
      Calculates the rating of a restaurant or cafe based on user votes. explicit use of RTTI
      Parameters:
      hodnota - The value of the vote.
      akyVoterDalHolos - The index of the user who voted.
      akyrestoran - The index of the restaurant or cafe being voted for.
      isCafe - Indicates if the entity being voted for is a cafe.
      Returns:
      The calculated rating of the restaurant or cafe.

    • vote

      public void vote(int userId, int restaurantId, boolean isCafe)
      Records a user's vote for a restaurant or cafe.
      Parameters:
      userId - The index of the user.
      restaurantId - The index of the restaurant or cafe.
      isCafe - Indicates if the entity being voted for is a cafe.

    • hasVoted

      public boolean hasVoted(int userId, int restaurantId, boolean isCafe)
      Checks if a user has already voted for a restaurant or cafe.
      Parameters:
      userId - The index of the user.
      restaurantId - The index of the restaurant or cafe.
      isCafe - Indicates if the entity being voted for is a cafe.
      Returns:
      True if the user has already voted, false otherwise.

      Generates statistics on the voting activity.

    • save

      public void save() throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      Saves the current state of the system to a file.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the loaded object cannot be found.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading from the file.

    • load

      public void load() throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      Loads a previously saved state of the system from a file.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the loaded object cannot be found.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading from the file.

    • obnulyt

      public void obnulyt()
      Resets all votes and ratings to their initial state.

      Parameters:
      strategy - The strategy to be used for calculation.
      u - The number of users.

    • CheckRightPaseord

      Checks if the password contains at least one Latin letters.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to be checked.
      Throws:
      checkingForSymbols - if the password not contains at least one Latin symbols.
